title: Chosen option in Font Info
content:
I use an exits Opentype font and add some new glyph (from 10A0 to 1EF9). After I generated font in Opentype (\*.otf).I can not use Adobe Type Manager to active font, there is error : “The font is damaged”.  
Please help me.

 [‹ Fontlab 5, multiple family styles Open Type or Type 1](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811072737/http:/typophile.com/node/20460 "Go to previous forum topic") [SimpleFont 2 is Released ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070811072737/http:/typophile.com/node/20436 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Tuan Tran

comments.content: That’s the Georgian block. Have you checked the necessary options for that Unicode range?
